_meanings:
{@--3@} Handsome, 
lovely; <ls>Me. 23</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 40</ls>, (where, 
however, the ordinary sense of 
‘border’ or ‘skirt’ may do as well,
though <ls>Malli.</ls> renders {#aMta#} by {#ramya#},
quoting the authority of {#SabdArRava#}).
{@--4@} Lowest, worst.
{@--5@} Youngest.
({%<ab>n.</ab>%} in some senses)

{@--3@} End of a
texture, edge, skirt, fringe or hem
of a garment; {#vastra°; pavanapranartitAMtadeSe#} 

{#dukUle#} <ls>K. 9</ls> (by itself in Veda).
{@--8@} The last word in a compound.

{@--9@} Ascertainment, or settlement
(of a question); definite or final
settlement; pause, final 
determination, as in {#sidDAMta#}; {#uBayorapi#} 
{#dfzwoMtastvanayostattvadarSiBiH#} <ls>Bg. 2. 16</ls> ({#sadasatoH ityarTaH#}).

{@--10@} The last portion or the 
remainder ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also); {#niSAMtaH, vedAMtaH#}, &c.

{@--12@} Total amount, whole
number or quantity.

{@--13@} A large
number.

{@--15@} Disposition;
essence; {#SudDAMtaH#} [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>Goth.</ab> {%andeis%},
{%and%}; <ab>Germ.</ab> {%ende%} and {%ent%}; also <ab>Gr.</ab>
{%anti%}; <ab>L.</ab> {%ante%}].
a chāṇḍāla.
{1} a barber.

{2} a
chāṇḍāla, low-caste.

having
the acute accent on the last syllable.

the acute accent on the last
syllable; <ls>P. VI. 1. 199.</ls>

death, destruction; {#Ro#} 
{#aMtakarmaRi#} <ls>Dhātupāṭha</ls>.

death;
{#varjayedaMtakfnmartyaM varjayedanilo'nalaM#} <ls>Rām.</ls>

having gone to the end of,
thoroughly conversant or familiar
with, (in <ab>comp.</ab>); {#SAKAMtagamaTADvaryuM#}
<ls>Ms. 3. 145.</ls>
perishing.
{2} death, perishing, dying.

{1} walking about, going to
the borders or frontiers.
last born.

a
figure of speech (in Rhetoric).

{2} a door-keeper
(rare).

being at the
end, last.

hidden, 
concealed.

dropping of the final of
a word.

dwelling
near the frontiers, dwelling close by.
[{#aMte gurusamIpe vastuM SIlaM yasya#}]

{1} a
pupil (who always dwells near his
master to receive instruction);  
<ls>P. IV. 3. 104</ls>; <ls n="P.">VI. 2. 36.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 33.</ls>

{2} a
chāṇḍāla (who dwells at the 
extremity of a village).
= {#°kAlaH#} <ab>q. v.</ab>

{1} a bed on the ground.

{2} the last
bed, death-bed; hence death itself.
{3} a place for burial or burning.

{4}
a bier or funeral pile.

last
rites, funeral ceremonies, obsequies.

a pupil; {#tamupAsate#}
